education_items.title: Credit Utilization 101: Why 30% Matters
education_items.description: Learn how credit utilization impacts your credit score and why keeping it below 30% is crucial for financial health.

education_items.title: Breaking the Minimum Payment Cycle
education_items.description: Understand the true cost of minimum payments and strategies to pay down credit card debt faster.

education_items.title: Autopay Setup Guide: Never Miss a Payment
education_items.description: Step-by-step guide to setting up automatic payments and avoiding late fees and credit damage.

education_items.title: Budgeting for Variable Income
education_items.description: Proven strategies for managing money when your paychecks aren't consistent, including percent-based budgeting.

education_items.title: Emergency Fund Basics: Your First $1,000
education_items.description: How to build your first emergency fund even with irregular income. Start small, build momentum.

education_items.title: Income Smoothing Strategies for Freelancers
education_items.description: Techniques to smooth irregular income and reduce financial stress between paychecks.

education_items.title: The Subscription Audit Checklist
education_items.description: Step-by-step process to identify, evaluate, and cancel unused subscriptions. Includes negotiation scripts.

education_items.title: Negotiating Lower Bills: Scripts That Work
education_items.description: Proven negotiation scripts for reducing cable, internet, phone, and subscription costs.

education_items.title: Setting Up Bill Alerts and Reminders
education_items.description: Use technology to track renewal dates and prevent surprise charges from subscriptions.

education_items.title: Savings Goals: From Dream to Reality
education_items.description: How to set achievable savings goals and track progress with visual tools and milestones.

education_items.title: Automating Your Savings: Set It and Forget It
education_items.description: Best practices for automatic transfers to maximize savings without thinking about it.

education_items.title: High-Yield Savings Accounts Compared
education_items.description: Compare APYs and features of top online savings accounts to maximize your interest earnings.

education_items.title: Short-Term Budgeting Tactics
education_items.description: Quick wins for reducing expenses this month without drastic lifestyle changes.

education_items.title: Expense Triage: What to Cut First
education_items.description: Data-driven approach to identifying and cutting your highest-impact expenses first.

partner_offers.description: Move high-interest balances to a card with 0% intro APR. Save on interest while paying down debt faster.
